subject: Re: Here's a question...
author: Rick
full_text:
Doesn't Chris Moon say there are only so many people who can operate these devices (30?), that that've been chosen to do so?

If so, and you are one of them, then you shouldn't have to ask that question.  And if not, then I guess asking doesn't help.




--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
>  What EVP statements does one choose to be false, and which is true? This is
> from that cell phone video, as noted, at the end "earth is doomed". Do I
> just assume this must be negative, so disregard it? Who's in charge of of
> determining what is valid, and what is not?
> 
>  Frank-S
>
